Document: #Survivor Roleplay Standards - Survivors have more leeway than marines with mental stability due to trauma experienced during the xenomorph attack. They may be suffering PTSD, paranoia or similar conditions for roleplaying purposes. - Survivors should not attack the hive before being rescued by the USCM. - Standard survivors are not hostile to the USCM. - If there is an exception due to faction it will be clear. - Hostile Faction Survivors cannot attempt to harm other survivors.
